About.about-slogan: Discover the most famous places in Central Asia.
About.about-main-text: From ancient cities to breathtaking landscapes, discover unforgettable destinations filled with history, culture and beauty.
About.title: About us
About.sub-text: We offer more than just tours, we offer unique experiences. Our team of local experts will show you the true essence of the country: from ancient cities and picturesque deserts to traditional ways of life. We take care of every detail to ensure your trip is comfortable, fulfilling, and truly memorable.
About.service-text: We offer a comprehensive approach to organizing travel in Turkmenistan. From planning to your return home, we'll be with you every step of the way, ensuring comfort, safety, and unforgettable experiences.
About.service-1-text: Individual and group trips along the most interesting routes.
About.service-2-text: Hotels, guest houses, and yurts – comfort for every taste and budget.
About.service-3-text: Convenient transportation throughout the country with experienced drivers.
About.service-4-text: Professional guides who will tell you more than just facts.
About.service-5-text: Consultations and support when applying for entry into the country.
About.service-6-text: Accurate, fast and reliable translation from native speakers.
About.parallax-text: We offer a full range of travel services to ensure your exploration of Turkmenistan is easy, engaging, and stress-free. Whether you're planning a busy tour or a relaxing getaway, we'll take care of everything—from the itinerary to accommodations and support.
About.why-choose-text: Planning a trip to Turkmenistan can be challenging – we make it easy, authentic, and unforgettable.
About.why-choose-1-text: We are located in Central Asia and work with experienced local guides who know Turkmenistan inside and out.
About.why-choose-2-text: From visa support and transfers to carefully selected accommodation, we take care of every detail so you can fully enjoy your trip.
About.why-choose-3-text: Our tours go beyond the ordinary, combining iconic landmarks with lesser-known spots and authentic cultural experiences.
About.why-choose-4-text: Travel in comfort in the company of like-minded people – without crowds and rush, only genuine impressions and vibrant moments.

Gallery.gallery-text: Take a look at the unforgettable moments of our tours. Stunning landscapes, rich culture, and happy travelers—see what awaits you on your next adventure.

Blog.why-text: We don't just organize tours—we create experiences. Our team knows every corner of Turkmenistan and Central Asia and selects itineraries with a passion for detail.
Blog.why-experience: Since 1998 in the field of tourism in Central Asia.
Blog.why-rhythm: We adapt tours to your interests and rhythm.
Blog.blog-text: Take a look at the unforgettable moments of our tours. Stunning landscapes, rich culture, and happy travelers—see what awaits you on your next adventure.
Blog.title: Tours of Turkmenistan's Hidden Treasures
Blog.text: Get off the beaten path and immerse yourself in the heart of Central Asia. Each tour is designed to provide you with an authentic and unforgettable experience.
Blog.card-text: Discover captivating stories, travel guides, and helpful tips to inspire your next trip. From little-known places in Turkmenistan to cultural insights and practical information, our blog brings the world closer to you, story by story.

Footer.footer-text: Discover the amazing world of Turkmenistan with us! We organize comfortable and safe tours to the country's main attractions — from the ancient cities of Merv and Nisa to the majestic sands of the Karakum Desert.

Tour.tour-text: Get off the beaten path and immerse yourself in the heart of Central Asia. Each tour is designed to provide you with an authentic and unforgettable experience.
Tour.tour-card-text: Discover carefully curated journeys to the most picturesque corners of the world. Ancient cities, natural wonders, and unique cultural itineraries—each tour is designed to provide you with an unforgettable experience, accompanied by experienced guides.

Tours.tours-text: Discover carefully curated journeys to the most picturesque corners of the world. Ancient cities, natural wonders, and unique cultural itineraries—each tour is designed to provide you with an unforgettable experience, accompanied by experienced guides.

Information.title: Prepare for your trip
Information.text: Discover everything you need to know before traveling — how to obtain a visa, where to stay, and what to look out for. We've compiled essential information to help you feel confident at every stage of your journey.
Information.hotel-title: Comfort, coziness, and reliability—the hotels we trust

Contacts.title: Ready for adventure? We're waiting for you!
Contacts.text: Contact our team to begin your journey through the unexplored corners of Turkmenistan. Want to ask a question, discuss tour details, or just get inspired? We're here—write, call, or come visit!
Contacts.name: Name
Contacts.subject: Subject
